roleset.name: wealthy, abundant (in money or other), add value
roleset.note: RICH-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-1, relation to enrich-v.01. (from rich.01-j)
RICHER-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from richer.01-j)

role.descr: money, vitamins, other form of wealth

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: Its air is rich in methane, as its lifeforms depend on it for survival.
example.arg: as its lifeforms depend on it for survival

example.name: Comparative, monetary wealth
example.text: Well basically the report says that Britain hands out over 9 billion pounds worth of aid every year , a substantial amount to Brazil which-1 [*-1] is richer than us , what is the reasoning to that !

roleset.name: sensorilly intense (as of color of flavor, etc)
roleset.note: RICH-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on WordNet. (from rich.02-j)

role.descr: modality, sensory domain in which arg0 is rich

example.name: both args
example.text: This dessert was very rich in chocolate flavours and was hard to finish.

example.name: arg1
example.text: The sound was very rich and full, and then at other times, soft and sweet.

example.name: both args
example.text: The sound was very rich in texture.
